product_name: Toysmith X-Stream X-5 Gliders - Twin Pack
long_description: These Toysmith X-Stream X-5 gliders are only 5 in. long, but they are capable of flights over 30 yards. Give them a toss and watch them soar. Made from a lightweight, durable and flexible foam material, these gliders come ready to fly with no assembly required. Toysmith X-Stream X-5 gliders can also be launched from under water; push glider to bottom of the pool, release and watch the self-propelled aqua glide.
short_description: These Toysmith X-Stream X-5 gliders are only 5 in. long, but they are capable of flights over 30 yards. Give them a toss and watch them soar.
